definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Sometimes you don't want an amphibious vehicle to look too much like a car.
sentences.chinese: 有時候你不想要一輛太像普通車的兩棲車。

sentences.english: I'd like to rent three standard bikes.
With conventional cars, this is pretty much true.
sentences.chinese: 對普通車而言這是很現實的。

sentences.english: Do you like to take a local train or an express?
sentences.chinese: 你想坐普通車還是快車？

definition: shuttle bus (or train)/train or bus traveling only part of its normal route
train or coach service ("service" as in "they run 12 services per day between the two cities")
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
to assign sb to a seat/to be allocated a place
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
local bus or train/slow train with many stops
departure (of a coach or train)/to dispatch a vehicle
